thread.title: Aladdin cast reunites to perform 'A Whole New World'
thread.title_full: Aladdin cast reunites to perform 'A Whole New World'

title: Aladdin cast reunites to perform 'A Whole New World'
text:
Aladdin cast reunites to perform 'A Whole New World' Voice actors sound little changed from 1992 POSTED: 11:59 AM Oct 12 2015 UPDATED: 11:18 AM Oct 12 2015 Text Size: Tweet Justin Kahn/Getty Images 
The original cast members who sang "A Whole New World" during the magic carpet ride sequence in "Aladdin" reunited to perform the song nearly a quarter century later. More from NBC Montana Shia LaBeouf arrested for public intoxication 
Lea Salonga (Jasmine) and Brad Kane (Aladdin) sang the heart-melting tune, accompanied by songwriter Alan Menken on piano. 
The two "Aladdin" voice actors sound little different performing the song live than when it was recorded for the 1992 film. 
Check out the performance below: Distributed by LAKANA. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten or redistributed.
